title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate lieutenant uniform and CS belt buckle with cavalry sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate lieutenant uniform and CS belt buckle with cavalry sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.9 x 8.8 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
